availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Parrum S. Hayslip (Edmonson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Edmonson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Henrietta Hayslip. Farmer in Edmonson County in 1850. Laborer employed by William Dicus in Edmonson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Edmonson County, p. 22B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Edmonson County, p. 43.
